Client Groups

# Young Drivers

Driving is a privilege that comes with many responsibilities. It is more than just putting theory into practice; it is putting yourself in a state of mind that leads to good behaviour.

Automobiles, motorcycles, mopeds or scooters: whether you are the driver or a passenger, there are choices to be made, but only one decision to make: the right one!

Last update: May 17, 2022

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That’s why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
